t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - In August 2005, Amazon began selling products under its own private label, Pinzon. The trademark applications indicated that the label would be used for textiles, kitchen utensils, and other household goods. In March 2007, the company applied to expand the trademark to cover a more diverse list of goods. The brand was officially launched in 2009. Along with AmazonBasics, it was Amazon's first ...

t: Amazon Private Label Brands - Marketplace Pulse
s: March 18, 2019 - According to Marketplace Pulse research, Amazon-owned private label brands are not nearly as successful as many paint them to be. Amazon has been successful in creating generic items at low prices, but only when using the Amazon brand name (i.e., AmazonBasics and Amazon Essentials).

t: How Does Merch by Amazon Work: The Complete Guide - Startupbros
s: December 11, 2023 - They shop on Amazon for the convenience, but also because they are known for their great pricing on products. One of the easiest ways to determine if you are pricing in the middle of the pack is to take all the prices on the first page of results, add them together, and then divide them by the total amount of listings on the page. This is what you would want to target as your price point. If you want to build a clothing brand...

t: 20 Top Private Label Brands from Amazon - Practical Ecommerce
s: January 27, 2025 - Here is a list of top private label brands from Amazon. The brands are sorted by the total number of customer reviews, as on average 3 to 5 percent of units sold generate reviews for these brands. I also used the Jungle Scout Chrome extension for additional research.

t: Amazon’s New Competitive Advantage: Putting Its Own Products First
s: June 6, 2020 - Brands have long been able to bid for the premier slot at the top left of Amazon’s listings, but during the pandemic the online retailer has begun using this position for its private-label items, raising antitrust concerns.

t: How Amazon Steers Shoppers to Its Own Products - The New York Times
